product_name: Eagle Creek RFID Blocker Neck Wallet
long_description: The Eagle Creek RFID Blocker Neck Wallet combats potential ID theft by blocking access to personal data stored on embedded microchips while keeping travel documents, credit cards and ID close at hand.
short_description: The Eagle Creek RFID Blocker Neck Wallet combats potential ID theft by blocking access to personal data stored on embedded microchips while keeping travel documents, credit cards and ID close at hand.
